text: 4.16 Mat 24.30-31, Apo 1.11, 1 Ko 15.23, 15.52, 1 Te 1.10, 2 Te 1.7 Bɨawl ne takaw kɨles tɨmel agek, ensel kɨles tɨmel olap ne suk agaknɨŋ, olap God akɨl ne ak pugɨnɨgab. Anɨb ak pen Bɨawl ne God man ne alaŋ kelɨgɨl ownɨgab. Binɨb Klays nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd, bɨlel kubal okok, kɨli ned tɨkjakɨnɨgabal.
